pages.text: Perhaps the single most important machine in this mod, Alloy Furnaces are key to progression, giving you access to a variety of important resources such as Silicon.

pages.title: Powered Furnace
pages.text: While being necessary for progression, the Alloy Furnace is also capable of producing a myriad of other materials.

pages.title: Powered Furnace
pages.text: $(#FFB7F4)2Lu per tick and the$(br)     world is yours
